subtitulo: Telegram is an application for communication between users, bots, and much more.n/n/In addition to making bot usage easier, Telegram also provides a unique identifier, called ID, which helps us precisely identify you and grant special access, such as during navigation.n/n/Without this ID, we wouldnâ€™t be able to use values, make transfers, virtual purchases inside the bot, or access other advantages accurately.
